Hi all  can I check for ocbc 360  if my salary credit is on like 25th every month  will I still be entitled for the save bonus if I don’t add the extra 500 on the 1st? Will they add up my balance from 1st to 24th then the new balance from 25th to 31st and divide to get the adb of 500?

Assuming you didn't touch a single cent in the account from 1st to 24th  for Feb 2024  you will meet the requirementjust on the dot  if your salary is $2584 (if salary credits earlier on 24th  since 25th is a Sunday) or $3875 (if salary credits late on 26th)  also only if you don't touch a single cent after salary credits.To help understanding MAB:https://t.me/HoneyMoneySG/167928
